# MatchRest Node Formatting

Represents a wildcard pattern used in pattern matching (i.e. `in *foo`)

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

# MatchRest Formatting

## Fails because no tests are written

Before:

```ruby
case "foo"
in *bar
end
```

After:

```ruby
case "foo"
in *bar
end
```
